youtube.title: Muscle Spasms in Raw Meat: Biology Explained
youtube.description: Watch this incredible footage showing exactly what a muscle spasm looks like in a piece of steak. This visual demonstration explains the involuntary contraction of muscle fibers similar to what humans experience during cramps. Subscribe for more fascinating biology facts! #biology #science
